data.name: Chrome - Dark Stylus
data.description:
Dark theme for the Stylus extension (chrome only).
UserStyles says "Not Available on Chrome" but I have no clue why so manual installation is currently the only choice.

data.name: Better Quizlet Dark Theme [V1.8.2]
data.description: Don't like the official Quizlet dark theme? Use this style! This style corrects a lot of things that are wrong with the official dark theme while also hiding most ads! For optimal use, turn off Quizlet's own dark theme! If you found a problem or want to leave feedback, feel free to do so below!

user.name: Lekrkoekj
user.about:
Hi I'm Lekrkoekj! 
I mostly make Dark Themes for a lot of sites on here. If you like any of my styles,  be sure to give feedback on them.

data.name: 87% Translation (WordPress) Dark
data.description:
Make 87percenttranslation.wordpress.com dark and easier to read.

I sometimes make dark CSS themes and JS userscripts. Some of them aren't terrible.
